vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the replacement of existing stone pavers at Main Street Garden Plaza Paving Project located at 1902 Main Street - Marshal Renee Construction Companies, LLC, only bidder - Not to exceed $257,845.10 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($136,600.02) and General Fund ($121,245.08)
